snippet: The world’s biggest smartphone maker is counting on the fifth version of its Galaxy S smartphone to prove its staying power as a mobile innovator.
abstract: Samsung Electronics says its first-quarter operating profit was 8.4 trillion won, or $7.96 billion, down 4.3 percent from year-ago quarter; is counting on fifth version of its Galaxy S smartphone to prove its staying power as mobile innovator.
lead_paragraph: The world’s biggest smartphone maker is counting on the fifth version of its Galaxy S smartphone to prove its staying power as a mobile innovator.

headline.main: Samsung Expects Earnings to Slip as Smartphone Sales Ebb
headline.print_headline: Samsung Expects Earnings to Slip as Smartphone Sales Ebb
